reviews.review_msg: Easier than BISC 101. Office hours don't help. Spends a lot of time on useless stuff during lectures. If she emphasizes something, it doesn't mean it'll be on the tests and vice versa. Overexplains and ends up complicating the topic, eventually confusing you so it's better to ask TAs for help. Lab exam is easier than 101 as it is open book.

the material may not be most exciting but a good prof should be able to make it interesting..it's not a completely hopeless subject.she really tried with her movies to make it interesting but I still found the class really dull and kinda pointless..I hate it when profs read off the PPT. don't even bother coming to review classes if you can read!

helpful in the lab and approachable but really unfair marking scheme.forget"answering the question"on the final just write everything you know that's remotely related to the question asked. I'd rather the exam was closed book but with a clear marking scheme.You really cant know how you did until you get it back..
Great public speaker, and is passionate about biology. She adds fun clicker questions for bonus points as well.
